After debuting at CES back in January, Samsung’s new suite of sexy TVs have now arrived in Australia. This includes the 8K QLED Neo which has quite a surprising price tag attached.

articles.title: ‘Pokemon Go’ on HoloLens gives a peek at how the future would look - Micky News
articles.description: Niantic shows a demo version of how players can play 'Pokemon Go' on the HoloLens 2 by not having to use their phone.
articles.content: What if you could play Pokemon Go without holding your phone? How convenient would that be? This amazing new version of Pokemon Go, with the help of HoloLens, can help you to battle your friends anyw… [+1974 chars]
